text.section: Any licensed veterinarian who performs professional services for an animal, by contract with, or by the written consent of, the owner or authorized agent shall have a lien on the animal to secure the cost of the service provided.
The priority among veterinarian's liens filed under this section shall be according to the first lien filed.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 452, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990.
